definitions.definition: The inedible parts of a grain-producing plant.
definitions.example: To separate out the chaff, early cultures tossed baskets of grain into the air and let the wind blow away the lighter chaff.

definitions.definition: Straw or hay cut up fine for the food of cattle.
Any excess or unwanted material, resource, or person; anything worthless.
Loose material, e.g. small strips of aluminum foil dropped from aircraft, intended to interfere with radar detection.
To use light, idle language by way of fun or ridicule; to banter.
To make fun of; to turn into ridicule by addressing in ironical or bantering language; to quiz.
